name: Summer VS Ice Cream
description:
this is my first jam, my first job with godot, and my first video game!

all is made by me (code, design, assets)... I hope you like it!

enjoy yourself!

p.s.: I've tested win32 and android version... all the others I don't know if works!

source code available here: https://github.com/fiaful/godotgamejam062018

edit: I've published a live html5 preview... I finally understood how to do it! (in live preview i've removed controller and enter and space keys to prevent problems - so you can jump with LMB or up arrow, U or W keys)
